headlines.description: Lazio forward Ciro Immobile moved closed to the Serie A goalscoring record for a single season when he was on target in the 2-0 win over Brescia.
headlines.shortLinkText: Lazio's Immobile nears Serie A goal mark

headlines.description: AC Milan's veteran forward Zlatan Ibrahimovic scored twice and Gianluigi Donnarumma saved a penalty as they won 4-1 at Sampdoria.
headlines.shortLinkText: Zlatan keeps AC Milan unbeaten since restart

headlines.description: Cristiano Ronaldo's hopes of finishing the season as top scorer in Italy's Serie A faded away as Juventus lost to Cagliari.
headlines.shortLinkText: Juve lose to Cagliari as Ronaldo's Golden Boot hopes fade
